> BTW as bad as the Eclipse startup time is its not the end of the world 5-12
> secs on my machine (guess it depends on what Windows has cached).

Just out of interest, would you mind sharing the specs of your machine? 
My desktop is pretty old - a 1.8G P4 with 768M of ram - and launching 
the runtime workbench takes 30-35 seconds. (I'm running Debian but I 
assume it's the hardware not the OS that's making the difference. Like 
all assumptions, this may be wrong.)

Cheers

Tim
